text: Navarangpura, also spelled Navrangpura, is an area in the city of Ahmedabad in Gujarat, India. The following well known educational and research institutions are located in Navarangpura: * Ahmedabad Textile Industry's Research Association * Center for Environmental Planning and Technology * Gujarat University * L.D. College of Engineering * Mount Carmel High School, Ahmedabad * Physical Research Laboratory * Vikram Sarabhai Community Science Centre The following well known educational and research institutions are located very close to Navarangpura: * Indian Institute of Management Ahmedabad Category:Neighbourhoods in Ahmedabad
title: Navarangpura
